item.title: Summary - Hurricane Irma (AT1/AL112017)
item.author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
item.description: ...IRMA BECOMES AN EXTREMELY DANGEROUS CATEGORY 5 HURRICANE... ...PREPARATIONS SHOULD BE RUSHED TO COMPLETION IN THE HURRICANE WARNING AREA... As of 8:00 AM AST Tue Sep 5 the center of Irma was located near 16.7, -57.7 with movement W at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 929 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 175 mph.
